data.title: Sebastian Junger – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Sebastian Junger. Browse Sebastian Junger’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
In My Time of Dying

How I Came Face to Face with the Idea of an Afterlife

By: Sebastian Junger

Narrated by: Sebastian Junger

Length: 4 hrs and 34 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 314

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 287

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 287

After a near-fatal health emergency, bestselling author of Tribe and The Perfect Storm Sebastian Junger shares a powerful reflection on death—and what might follow.

5 out of 5 stars

God and religion

By K. Anderson on 05-22-24

In My Time of Dying

How I Came Face to Face with the Idea of an Afterlife

By: Sebastian Junger

Narrated by: Sebastian Junger

Length: 4 hrs and 21 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 7

Performance

5 out of 5 stars 7

Story

5 out of 5 stars 7

For years as an award-winning war reporter, Sebastian Junger traveled to many front lines and frequently put his life at risk. And yet the closest he ever came to death was the summer of 2020 while spending a quiet afternoon at the New England home he shared with his wife and two young children.

5 out of 5 stars

Phenomenal
